00010 
00011   string s=plName;
00012   s+="'s notepad";
00013   this->label(s.c_str());

00015   existingNote=false;
00016 
00017     hbNoteList=new Fl_Hold_Browser(10, 10, 250, 430, 
00018                                                 "Notes List");
00019 
00020     noteTitle= new Fl_Input(270, 10, 450, 20);
00021     noteText =new Fl_Multiline_Input(270, 40, 450, 400 );
00022 
00023     Fl_Button* closeBtn=new Fl_Button(270, 445,100, 30, "Close");
00024     addBtn=new Fl_Button(380, 445,100, 30, "Add");
00025     delBtn=new Fl_Button(490, 445,100, 30, "delete");
00026     saveBtn=new Fl_Button(600, 445,100, 30, "Save");
00027 
00028   this->end();
00029 
00030   addBtn->deactivate();
00031   delBtn->deactivate();
00032   saveBtn->deactivate();
00033 
00034   noteTitle->when(FL_WHEN_CHANGED);
00035   noteTitle->callback( cbTitleChange, this );
00036 
00037   noteText->when(FL_WHEN_CHANGED);
00038   noteText->callback( cbTextChange, this );
00039 
00040   closeBtn->callback( cbClose, this );

00042   hbNoteList->callback(cbNoteListe, this );
00043   delBtn->callback(cbDelNote, this );
00044   saveBtn->callback(cbSaveNote, this );
00045 
00046   loadNoteList();
00047   this->show();
00048 }

00097 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerNotePad::i_cbTitleChange(){
00098   if (existingNote){
00099       saveBtn->activate();
00100   }
00101   else{
00102     if (strlen(noteTitle->value())>0)
00103       addBtn->activate();
00104     else
00105       addBtn->deactivate();
00106   }
00107 }

00150 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerNotePad::i_cbNoteListe(){
00151   // get the selected item
00152   int sel=hbNoteList->value();
00153 
00154   saveBtn->deactivate();
00155 
00156   // An item is selected
00157   if (sel>0){
00158     //get the text of this item
00159     const char* str= hbNoteList->text(sel);
00160     showNote(str);
00161     delBtn->activate();
00162     existingNote=true;
00163   }
00164   else{
00165     showNoneNote();
00166     delBtn->deactivate();
00167     existingNote=false;
00168   }
00169 
00170 }
00171 
00176 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerNotePad::showNote(const char* noteTitle){
00177   tNoteList::const_iterator iter;
00178 
00179   if (this->noteList){
00180 
00181     for (iter=noteList->begin(); iter != noteList->end(); iter++){
00182       if (strcmp((*iter)->title,noteTitle)==0){
00183         // Keep the original title in case it is changed
00184         modifiedNoteTitle=(*iter)->title;
00185         this->noteTitle->value((*iter)->title);
00186         noteText->value((*iter)->text);
00187       }
00188     }
00189   }
00190 }

00275 void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerNotePad::refreshKeep(){
00276  // store the selected item id
00277   int sel=hbNoteList->value();
00278 
00279   refresh();
00280 
00281   // restore the stored and shown tiem
00282   hbNoteList->select(sel);
00283   i_cbNoteListe();
00284   hbNoteList->take_focus();
00285 }
